00036 #include <C4gOpen.hpp>

00039 
00042 C4gOpen::C4gOpen() :
00043       realTimeTask(NULL),
00044       realTimeSocket(-1),
00045       portNumber(DEFAULT_PORT_NUMBER),
00046       communicationTimeout(COMMUNICATION_TIMEOUT),
00047       numberOfOpenAxes(0),
00048       sampleTime(-1),
00049       lastError(NO_ERROR)
00050 {
00051   c4gSocketLength = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
00052   startUpPacket = malloc(MAX_SIZE_OF_PACKETS);
00053 
00054   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ARMS * MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM; i++) logicalToOpenMap[i] = -1;
00055 
00056   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ARMS; i++)
00057   {
00058     exitFromOpenDone[i] = false;
00059     canChangeMode[i]  = true;
00060   }
00061 
00062   resetFlags();
00063 
00064   resetInitPacket();
00065   resetCommPacketRx();
00066   resetCommPacketTx();
00067   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_OPEN_AXES; i++) commPacketTx.axisData[i].mode = -1;
00068 }

00077 C4gOpen::C4gOpen(int portNumber)
00078 {
00079   C4gOpen();
00080   this->portNumber = portNumber;
00081 }

00084 C4gOpen::~C4gOpen()
00085 {
00086   free(startUpPacket);
00087 }

00093 void C4gOpen::resetInitPacket()
00094 {
00095   initPacket.seqNumber         = 0;
00096   initPacket.numberOfFieldsPerPacket = 0;
00097   initPacket.numberOfFieldsPerAxis   = 0;
00098   initPacket.numberOfAxesInOpenMode  = 0;
00099 
00100   initPacket.typeOfHeaderField1 = 0;
00101   initPacket.typeOfHeaderField2   = 0;
00102   initPacket.typeOfHeaderField3   = 0;
00103   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField1 = 0;
00104   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField2 = 0;
00105   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField3 = 0;
00106   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField4 = 0;
00107   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField5 = 0;
00108   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField6 = 0;
00109   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField7 = 0;
00110   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField8 = 0;
00111   initPacket.typeOfAxisDataField9 = 0;
00112 
00113   initPacket.sampleTime  = 0;
00114 
00115   initPacket.majorNumber = 0;
00116   initPacket.minorNumber = 0;
00117   initPacket.buildNumber = 0;
00118 
00119   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM; i++)
00120   {
00121     initPacket.arm1OpenMode[i] = -1;
00122     initPacket.arm2OpenMode[i] = -1;
00123     initPacket.arm3OpenMode[i] = -1;
00124     initPacket.arm4OpenMode[i] = -1;
00125 
00126     initPacket.arm1OpenAxesMap[i] = -1;
00127     initPacket.arm2OpenAxesMap[i] = -1;
00128     initPacket.arm3OpenAxesMap[i] = -1;
00129     initPacket.arm4OpenAxesMap[i] = -1;
00130 
00131     initPacket.arm1CalibrationConstant[i] = NAN;
00132     initPacket.arm2CalibrationConstant[i] = NAN;
00133     initPacket.arm3CalibrationConstant[i] = NAN;
00134     initPacket.arm4CalibrationConstant[i] = NAN;
00135 
00136     initPacket.arm1CurrentLimit[i] = NAN;
00137     initPacket.arm2CurrentLimit[i] = NAN;
00138     initPacket.arm3CurrentLimit[i] = NAN;
00139     initPacket.arm4CurrentLimit[i] = NAN;
00140 
00141     initPacket.arm1TxRate[i] = NAN;
00142     initPacket.arm2TxRate[i] = NAN;
00143     initPacket.arm3TxRate[i] = NAN;
00144     initPacket.arm4TxRate[i] = NAN;
00145 
00146     initPacket.arm1KinInflCoeff[i] = NAN;
00147     initPacket.arm2KinInflCoeff[i] = NAN;
00148     initPacket.arm3KinInflCoeff[i] = NAN;
00149     initPacket.arm4KinInflCoeff[i] = NAN;
00150 
00151     initPacket.arm1FollowingError[i] = NAN;
00152     initPacket.arm2FollowingError[i] = NAN;
00153     initPacket.arm3FollowingError[i] = NAN;
00154     initPacket.arm4FollowingError[i] = NAN;
00155   }
00156 }

00162 void C4gOpen::resetCommPacketRx()
00163 {
00164   commPacketRx.header.seqNumber     = 0;
00165   commPacketRx.header.status      = 0;
00166   commPacketRx.header.functionality = 0;
00167 
00168   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_OPEN_AXES; i++)
00169   {
00170     commPacketRx.axisData[i].mode       =  -1;
00171     commPacketRx.axisData[i].targetPosition = 0.0;
00172     commPacketRx.axisData[i].targetVelocity = 0.0;
00173     commPacketRx.axisData[i].actualPosition = 0.0;
00174     commPacketRx.axisData[i].actualVelocity = 0.0;
00175     commPacketRx.axisData[i].targetCurrent  = 0.0;
00176     commPacketRx.axisData[i].extra1     = 0.0;
00177     commPacketRx.axisData[i].extra2     = 0.0;
00178     commPacketRx.axisData[i].extra3     = 0.0;
00179   }
00180 }

00186 void C4gOpen::resetCommPacketTx()
00187 {
00188   commPacketTx.header.seqNumber     = 0;
00189   commPacketTx.header.status      = 0;
00190   commPacketTx.header.functionality = 0;
00191   
00192   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_OPEN_AXES; i++)
00193   {
00194     commPacketTx.axisData[i].targetPosition = 0.0;
00195     commPacketTx.axisData[i].targetVelocity = 0.0;
00196     commPacketTx.axisData[i].measure    = 0.0;
00197     commPacketTx.axisData[i].ffwVelocity  = 0.0;
00198     commPacketTx.axisData[i].ffwCurrent   = 0.0;
00199     commPacketTx.axisData[i].extra1     = 0.0;
00200     commPacketTx.axisData[i].extra2     = 0.0;
00201     commPacketTx.axisData[i].extra3     = 0.0;
00202   }
00203 }

00209 void C4gOpen::resetFlags()
00210 {
00211   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ARMS; i++) setModeDone[i] = false;
00212 
00213   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_OPEN_AXES; i++)
00214   {
00215     setTargetPositionDone[i]    = false;
00216     setTargetVelocityDone[i]    = false;
00217     setMeasureDone[i]         = false;
00218     setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i] = false;
00219     setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i]  = false;
00220     setDeltaCurrentDone[i]      = false;
00221     followingErrorOvercome[i]   = false;
00222   }
00223 }

00226 
00233 bool C4gOpen::start(bool taskToInit)
00234 {
00235   if (taskToInit) return startWithRtTask();
00236   else return startWithoutRtTask();
00237 }
00238 
00240 
00252 bool C4gOpen::startWithRtTask()
00253 {
00254   bool retValue = true;
00255   
00256   if (initRealTimeSocket())
00257   {
00258     if (initRealTimeTask()) retValue = waitInitPacket();
00259     else
00260     {
00261       lastError = RT_TASK_INIT_ERROR;
00262       retValue = false;
00263     }
00264   }
00265   else
00266   {
00267     lastError = RT_SOCKET_INIT_ERROR;
00268     retValue = false;
00269   }
00270   
00271   return retValue;
00272 }
00273 
00275 
00282 bool C4gOpen::startWithoutRtTask()
00283 {
00284   bool retValue = true;
00285 
00286   rt_make_soft_real_time();
00287   if (initRealTimeSocket())
00288   {
00289     rt_make_hard_real_time();
00290     retValue = waitInitPacket();
00291   }
00292   else
00293   {
00294     lastError = RT_SOCKET_INIT_ERROR;
00295     retValue = false;
00296   }
00297   
00298   return retValue;
00299 }
00300 
00301 
00303 
00313 bool C4gOpen::initRealTimeSocket()
00314 {
00315   bool retValue = true;
00316   
00317   realTimeSocket = rt_dev_socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0);
00318   if (realTimeSocket >= 0)
00319   {
00320     memset(&realTimeSocketStruct, 0, sizeof(realTimeSocketStruct));
00321     realTimeSocketStruct.sin_family = AF_INET;
00322     realTimeSocketStruct.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00323     realTimeSocketStruct.sin_port = htons(portNumber);
00324     if (rt_dev_bind(realTimeSocket, (struct sockaddr *)&realTimeSocketStruct, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in)) < 0)
00325     {
00326       lastError = RT_SOCKET_BINDING_ERROR;
00327       retValue = false;
00328     }
00329   }
00330   else
00331   {
00332     lastError = RT_SOCKET_OPEN_ERROR;
00333     retValue = false;
00334   }
00335   
00336   return retValue;
00337 }
00338 
00340 
00345 bool C4gOpen::initRealTimeTask()
00346 {
00347   bool retValue = true;
00348 
00349   rt_grow_and_lock_stack(STACK_SIZE_KB*1024);
00350   
00351   realTimeTask = rt_task_init_schmod(nam2num("C4G"), 1, 0, 0, SCHED_FIFO, 0xFF);
00352   if (realTimeTask != NULL)
00353   {
00354     rt_task_use_fpu(realTimeTask, 1);
00355     rt_set_oneshot_mode();
00356     if (!rt_is_hard_timer_running()) start_rt_timer(0);
00357     rt_make_hard_real_time();
00358   }
00359   else
00360   {
00361     lastError = RT_TASK_INIT_ERROR; 
00362     retValue = false;
00363   }
00364   
00365   return retValue;
00366 }
00367 
00369 
00387 bool C4gOpen::waitInitPacket()
00388 {
00389   bool retValue = true;
00390 
00391   setCommunicationTimeout(WAIT_INIT_PCK_TIMEOUT);
00392 
00393   int received = receivePacket(startUpPacket, sizeof(InitPacket));
00394   
00395   if (received >= 0)
00396   {
00397     if (received == sizeof(InitPacket)) // Client restart (mode 506)
00398     {
00399       if (((InitPacket *)startUpPacket)->seqNumber == 10)
00400       {
00401         if (!readInitPacket())
00402         {
00403           lastError = INIT_PACKET_RECEIVE_ERROR;
00404           retValue = false;
00405         }
00406       }
00407       else
00408       {
00409         lastError = INIT_PACKET_UNEXPECTED_SEQ_NUM;
00410         retValue = false;
00411       }
00412     }
00413     else  // C4G restart
00414     {
00415       sendPacket(startUpPacket, sizeof(commPacketTx));
00416       for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00417       {
00418         receivePacket(startUpPacket, MAX_SIZE_OF_PACKETS);
00419         sendPacket(startUpPacket, sizeof(commPacketTx));
00420       }
00421 
00422       if (receivePacket(startUpPacket, sizeof(InitPacket)) == sizeof(InitPacket))
00423       {
00424         if (((InitPacket *)startUpPacket)->seqNumber == 10)
00425         {
00426           if (!readInitPacket())
00427           {
00428             lastError = INIT_PACKET_RECEIVE_ERROR;
00429             retValue = false;
00430           }
00431         }
00432         else
00433         {
00434           lastError = INIT_PACKET_UNEXPECTED_SEQ_NUM;
00435           retValue = false;
00436         }
00437       }
00438       else retValue = false;
00439 
00440       if (retValue)
00441       {
00442         for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00443         {
00444           receivePacket(startUpPacket, MAX_SIZE_OF_PACKETS);
00445           sendPacket(startUpPacket, sizeof(commPacketTx));
00446         }
00447       }
00448     }
00449   }
00450   else retValue = false;
00451 
00452   setCommunicationTimeout(COMMUNICATION_TIMEOUT);
00453 
00454   return retValue;  
00455 }
00456 
00458 
00464 bool C4gOpen::readInitPacket()
00465 {
00466   bool retValue = true;
00467 
00468   initPacket = *(InitPacket *)startUpPacket;
00469 
00470   numberOfOpenAxes = initPacket.numberOfAxesInOpenMode;
00471   sampleTime = initPacket.sampleTime;
00472 
00473   mapIndices(1, initPacket.arm1OpenAxesMap);
00474   mapIndices(2, initPacket.arm2OpenAxesMap);
00475   mapIndices(3, initPacket.arm3OpenAxesMap);
00476   mapIndices(4, initPacket.arm4OpenAxesMap);
00477 
00478   if (sendPacket(startUpPacket, sizeof(InitPacket)) != sizeof(InitPacket)) retValue = false;
00479 
00480   return retValue;
00481 }
00482 
00484 
00492 int C4gOpen::receivePacket(void *packet, int bytesToBeReceived)
00493 {
00494   return rt_dev_recvfrom(realTimeSocket, packet, bytesToBeReceived, 0, (sockaddr *)&c4gSocketStruct, &c4gSocketLength);
00495 }
00496 
00498 
00506 int C4gOpen::sendPacket(void *packet, int bytesToSend)
00507 {
00508   *(long *)packet += 1;
00509   if (*(long *)packet > 0x7FFF) *(long *)packet = 1;
00510 
00511   return rt_dev_sendto(realTimeSocket, packet, bytesToSend, 0, (sockaddr *)&c4gSocketStruct, sizeof(c4gSocketStruct));
00512 }
00513 
00515 
00522 bool C4gOpen::receive()
00523 {
00524   bool retValue = true;
00525   int bytesToBeReceived = sizeof(Header) + numberOfOpenAxes*sizeof(AxisDataRx);
00526 
00527   resetCommPacketRx();
00528 
00529   if (!errorOccurred())
00530   {
00531     if (receivePacket((CommPacketRx *)&commPacketRx, bytesToBeReceived) != bytesToBeReceived)
00532     {
00533       lastError = RT_SOCKET_RECEIVE_ERROR;
00534       retValue = false;
00535     }
00536   }
00537   else retValue = false;
00538 
00539   return retValue;
00540 }
00541 
00543 
00551 bool C4gOpen::send()
00552 {
00553   bool retValue = true;
00554   int bytesToSend = sizeof(Header) + numberOfOpenAxes*sizeof(AxisDataTx);
00555 
00556   commPacketTx.header.seqNumber = commPacketRx.header.seqNumber;
00557 
00558   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ARMS; i++)
00559   {
00560     if (exitFromOpenDone[i])
00561     {
00562       canChangeMode[i]  = true;
00563       exitFromOpenDone[i] = false;
00564     }
00565 
00566     for (int j = 0; j < MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM; j++)
00567     {
00568       int openIndex = getOpenIndex(i+1, j+1);
00569       if (openIndex != -1)
00570       {
00571         if (!setModeDone[i]) commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].mode = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].mode;
00572 
00573         if (commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].mode == C4G_OPEN_MODE_0_DEBUG)
00574         {
00575           commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].targetPosition = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].targetPosition;
00576           commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].targetVelocity = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].targetVelocity;
00577           commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].measure    = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].actualPosition;
00578           commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].ffwVelocity  = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].actualVelocity;
00579           commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].ffwCurrent   = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].targetCurrent;
00580         }
00581       }
00582     }
00583   }
00584 
00585   checkOperations();
00586 
00587   if (errorOccurred())
00588   {
00589     bool followingErrorFound = false;
00590     
00591     for (int i = 0; i < numberOfOpenAxes && !followingErrorFound; i++)
00592     {
00593       if (followingErrorOvercome[i])
00594       {
00595         commPacketTx.axisData[i].mode = C4G_OPEN_FOLLOWING_ERROR;
00596         followingErrorFound = true;
00597       }
00598     }
00599     
00600     if (!followingErrorFound)
00601     {
00602       for (int i = 0; i < numberOfOpenAxes; i++)
00603         commPacketTx.axisData[i].mode = C4G_OPEN_DRIVE_OFF;
00604     }
00605   }
00606   
00607   if (sendPacket((CommPacketTx *)&commPacketTx, bytesToSend) == bytesToSend)
00608   {
00609     resetCommPacketTx();
00610     resetFlags();
00611   }
00612   else
00613   {
00614     lastError = RT_SOCKET_SEND_ERROR;
00615     retValue = false;
00616   }
00617   
00618   return retValue;
00619 }
00620 
00622 
00628 void C4gOpen::stop(bool taskToClose)
00629 {
00630   if (taskToClose) closeRealTimeTask();
00631   closeRealTimeSocket();
00632 }
00633 
00635 void C4gOpen::closeRealTimeTask()
00636 {
00637   if (realTimeTask != NULL)
00638   {
00639     rt_make_soft_real_time();
00640 //    stop_rt_timer();
00641     rt_task_delete(realTimeTask);
00642   }
00643 }
00644 
00646 void C4gOpen::closeRealTimeSocket()
00647 {
00648   if (realTimeSocket != -1) rt_dev_close(realTimeSocket);
00649 }

00664 void C4gOpen::setCommunicationTimeout(long long timeout)
00665 {
00666   communicationTimeout = timeout;
00667   rt_dev_ioctl(realTimeSocket, RTNET_RTIOC_TIMEOUT, &communicationTimeout);
00668 }

00671 
00674 bool C4gOpen::errorOccurred()
00675 {
00676   if (lastError != NO_ERROR) return true;
00677   else return false;
00678 }

00700 
00708 void C4gOpen::mapIndices(int arm, long armOpenAxesMap[MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM])
00709 {
00710   for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM; i++)
00711   {
00712     if (armOpenAxesMap[i] != 0xFF) logicalToOpenMap[(arm - 1) * MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM + i] = armOpenAxesMap[i];
00713   }
00714 }
00715 
00717 
00725 int C4gOpen::getOpenIndex(int arm, int axis)
00726 {
00727   return logicalToOpenMap[(arm - 1) * MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM + (axis - 1)];
00728 }
00729 
00731 
00741 bool C4gOpen::checkArm(int arm)
00742 {
00743   bool retValue = true;
00744   bool isOpenArm = false;
00745 
00746   if (arm >= 1 && arm <= MAX_NUM_ARMS)
00747   {
00748     for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM && !isOpenArm; i++)
00749     {
00750       if (getOpenIndex(arm, i+1) != -1) isOpenArm = true;
00751     }
00752     if (!isOpenArm)
00753     {
00754       lastError = ARM_NOT_IN_OPEN_MODE;
00755       retValue = false;
00756     }
00757   }
00758   else
00759   {
00760     lastError = INVALID_ARM_NUMBER;
00761     retValue = false;
00762   }
00763 
00764   return retValue;
00765 }
00766 
00768 
00780 bool C4gOpen::checkAxis(int arm, int axis)
00781 {
00782   bool retValue = true;
00783 
00784   if (checkArm(arm))
00785   {
00786     if (axis >= 1 && axis <= MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM)
00787     {
00788       if (getOpenIndex(arm, axis) == -1)
00789       {
00790         lastError = AXIS_NOT_IN_OPEN_MODE;
00791         retValue = false;
00792       }
00793     }
00794     else
00795     {
00796       lastError = INVALID_AXIS_NUMBER;
00797       retValue = false;
00798     }
00799   }
00800   else retValue = false;
00801 
00802   return retValue;
00803 }

00824 
00829 float C4gOpen::getCalibrationConstant(int arm, int axis)
00830 {
00831   float calibrationConstant = NAN;
00832 
00833   if (!errorOccurred())
00834   {
00835     if (checkAxis(arm, axis))
00836     {
00837       switch (arm)
00838       {
00839         case 1:
00840           calibrationConstant = initPacket.arm1CalibrationConstant[axis - 1];
00841           break;
00842         case 2:
00843           calibrationConstant = initPacket.arm2CalibrationConstant[axis - 1];
00844           break;
00845         case 3:
00846           calibrationConstant = initPacket.arm3CalibrationConstant[axis - 1];
00847           break;
00848         case 4:
00849           calibrationConstant = initPacket.arm4CalibrationConstant[axis - 1];
00850           break;
00851       }
00852 
00853       return calibrationConstant;
00854     }
00855     else return NAN;  
00856   }
00857   else return NAN;  
00858 }
00859

00866 float C4gOpen::getCurrentLimit(int arm, int axis)
00867 {
00868   float currentLimit = NAN;
00869 
00870   if (!errorOccurred())
00871   {
00872     if (checkAxis(arm, axis))
00873     {
00874       switch (arm)
00875       {
00876         case 1:
00877           currentLimit = initPacket.arm1CurrentLimit[axis - 1];
00878           break;
00879         case 2:
00880           currentLimit = initPacket.arm2CurrentLimit[axis - 1];
00881           break;
00882         case 3:
00883           currentLimit = initPacket.arm3CurrentLimit[axis - 1];
00884           break;
00885         case 4:
00886           currentLimit = initPacket.arm4CurrentLimit[axis - 1];
00887           break;
00888       }
00889     
00890       return currentLimit;
00891     }
00892     else return NAN;
00893   }
00894   else return NAN;
00895 }

00898 
00903 float C4gOpen::getTxRate(int arm, int axis)
00904 {
00905   float txRate = NAN;
00906 
00907   if (!errorOccurred())
00908   {
00909     if (checkAxis(arm, axis))
00910     {
00911       switch (arm)
00912       {
00913         case 1:
00914           txRate = initPacket.arm1TxRate[axis - 1];
00915           break;
00916         case 2:
00917           txRate = initPacket.arm2TxRate[axis - 1];
00918           break;
00919         case 3:
00920           txRate = initPacket.arm3TxRate[axis - 1];
00921           break;
00922         case 4:
00923           txRate = initPacket.arm4TxRate[axis - 1];
00924           break;
00925       }
00926 
00927       return txRate;
00928     }
00929     else return NAN;
00930   }
00931   else return NAN;
00932 }

01069           break;
01070         case 2:
01071           followingErrorThreshold = initPacket.arm2FollowingError[axis - 1];
01072           break;
01073         case 3:
01074           followingErrorThreshold = initPacket.arm3FollowingError[axis - 1];
01075           break;
01076         case 4:
01077           followingErrorThreshold = initPacket.arm4FollowingError[axis - 1];
01078           break;
01079       }
01080       
01081       return followingErrorThreshold;
01082     }
01083     else return NAN;
01084   }
01085   else return NAN;

01093 bool C4gOpen::isInDriveOn(int arm)
01094 {
01095   bool retValue = true;
01096   long *armStatus = &commPacketRx.header.status;
01097   
01098   if (!errorOccurred())
01099   {
01100     if (checkArm(arm))
01101     {
01102       if (*((char *)armStatus + (arm - 1)) != DRIVE_ON) retValue = false;
01103     }
01104     else retValue = false;
01105   }
01106   else retValue = false;
01107 
01108   return retValue;
01109 }

01112 
01116 bool C4gOpen::exitFromOpen(int arm)
01117 {
01118   bool retValue = true;
01119   long *armStatus = &commPacketTx.header.status;
01120 
01121   if (!errorOccurred())
01122   {
01123     if (checkArm(arm))
01124     {
01125       *((char *)armStatus + (arm - 1)) = EXIT_FROM_OPEN;
01126       exitFromOpenDone[arm-1] = true;
01127     }
01128     else retValue = false;
01129   }
01130   else retValue = false;
01131 
01132   return retValue;
01133 }

01142 long C4gOpen::getFunctionality(int arm)
01143 {
01144   long *functionality = &commPacketRx.header.functionality;
01145 
01146   if (!errorOccurred())
01147   {
01148     if (checkArm(arm)) return *((char *)functionality + (arm - 1));
01149     else return -1;
01150   } 
01151   else return -1;
01152 }

01155 
01159 long C4gOpen::getMode(int arm)
01160 {
01161   long mode = -1;
01162 
01163   if (!errorOccurred())
01164   {
01165     if (checkArm(arm))
01166     {
01167       for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM && mode == -1; i++)
01168       {
01169         int openIndex = getOpenIndex(arm, i+1);
01170         if (openIndex != -1) mode = commPacketRx.axisData[openIndex].mode;
01171       }
01172     }
01173   }
01174 
01175   return mode;
01176 }
01177 
01179 
01196 bool C4gOpen::setMode(int arm, long mode)
01197 {
01198   bool retValue = true;
01199   
01200   if (!errorOccurred())
01201   {
01202     if (canChangeMode[arm-1] || getMode(arm) == 0 || mode == getMode(arm))
01203     {
01204       if (checkArm(arm))
01205       {
01206         if (checkMode(mode))
01207         {
01208           for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_AXES_PER_ARM; i++)
01209           {
01210             int openIndex = getOpenIndex(arm, i+1);
01211             if (openIndex != -1) commPacketTx.axisData[openIndex].mode = mode;
01212           }
01213       
01214           if (canChangeMode[arm-1]) canChangeMode[arm-1] = false;
01215 
01216           setModeDone[arm-1] = true;
01217         }
01218         else
01219         {
01220           lastError = INVALID_OPEN_MODE;
01221           retValue = false;
01222         }
01223       }
01224       else retValue = false;
01225     }
01226     else
01227     {
01228       lastError = SET_MODE_NOT_ALLOWED;
01229       retValue = false;
01230     }
01231   }
01232   else retValue = false;
01233 
01234   return retValue;
01235 }
01236 
01238 
01244 bool C4gOpen::checkMode(long mode)
01245 {
01246   bool retValue = false;
01247   unsigned int numberOfValidOpenModes = sizeof(validOpenModes) / sizeof(long);
01248 
01249   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfValidOpenModes && !retValue; i++)
01250     if (mode == validOpenModes[i]) retValue = true;
01251 
01252   return retValue;
01253 }

01269   else return NAN;

01285 bool C4gOpen::setTargetPosition(int arm, int axis, float targetPosition)
01286 {
01287   bool retValue = true;
01288 
01289   if (!errorOccurred())
01290   {
01291     if (checkAxis(arm, axis))
01292     {
01293       checkFollowingError(arm, axis, targetPosition);
01294       commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].targetPosition = targetPosition;
01295       setTargetPositionDone[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)] = true;
01296     }
01297     else retValue = false;
01298   }
01299   else retValue = false;
01300 
01301   return retValue;
01302 }

01451 
01460 bool C4gOpen::setFeedForwardCurrent(int arm, int axis, float ffwCurrent)
01461 {
01462   bool retValue = true;
01463   float currentLimit = getCurrentLimit(arm, axis);
01464 
01465   if (!errorOccurred())
01466   {
01467     if (checkAxis(arm, axis))
01468     {
01469       if (ffwCurrent > currentLimit) commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].ffwCurrent = currentLimit;
01470       else if (ffwCurrent < -currentLimit) commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].ffwCurrent = -currentLimit;
01471       else commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].ffwCurrent = ffwCurrent;
01472       setFeedForwardCurrentDone[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)] = true;
01473     }
01474     else retValue = false;
01475   }
01476   else retValue = false;
01477 
01478   return retValue;
01479 }
01480 
01482 
01491 bool C4gOpen::setDeltaCurrent(int arm, int axis, float deltaCurrent)
01492 {
01493   bool retValue = true;
01494   float actualCurrent = getTargetCurrent(arm, axis);
01495   float currentLimit = getCurrentLimit(arm, axis);
01496 
01497   if (!errorOccurred())
01498   {
01499     if (checkAxis(arm, axis))
01500     {
01501       if (actualCurrent + deltaCurrent > currentLimit) commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].ffwCurrent = currentLimit - actualCurrent;
01502       else if (actualCurrent + deltaCurrent < -currentLimit) commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].ffwCurrent = -currentLimit - actualCurrent;
01503       else commPacketTx.axisData[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)].ffwCurrent = deltaCurrent;
01504       setDeltaCurrentDone[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)] = true;
01505     }
01506     else retValue = false;
01507   }
01508   else retValue = false;
01509 
01510   return retValue;
01511 }

01662 
01664 
01677 bool C4gOpen::checkFollowingError(int arm, int axis, float targetPosition)
01678 {
01679   bool retValue = true;
01680 
01681   float actualPosition = getActualPosition(arm, axis);
01682   float followingErrorThreshold = getFollowingErrorThreshold(arm, axis);
01683 
01684   if (fabs(actualPosition - targetPosition) > followingErrorThreshold)
01685   {
01686     followingErrorOvercome[getOpenIndex(arm, axis)] = true;
01687     lastError = FOLLOWING_ERROR_OVERCOME;
01688     retValue = false;
01689   }
01690 
01691   return retValue;
01692 }
01693 
01695 
01705 bool C4gOpen::checkOperations()
01706 {
01707   bool retValue = true;
01708 
01709   for (int i = 0; i < numberOfOpenAxes && retValue; i++)
01710   {
01711     switch (commPacketTx.axisData[i].mode)
01712     {
01713       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_0:
01714         if (setTargetPositionDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED; retValue = false; }
01715         if (setTargetVelocityDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED; retValue = false; }
01716         if (setMeasureDone[i])         { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED; retValue = false; } 
01717         if (setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED; retValue = false; }
01718         if (setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED; retValue = false; }
01719         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED; retValue = false; }
01720         break;
01721   
01722       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_0_DEBUG:
01723         // Set operations are automatically performed by send() method.
01724         break;
01725 
01726       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_1:
01727       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_1_STANDBY:
01728         if (!setTargetPositionDone[i])    { lastError = SET_TARGET_POSITION_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01729         if (!setTargetVelocityDone[i])    { lastError = SET_TARGET_VELOCITY_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01730         if (setMeasureDone[i])        { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }  
01731         if (!setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = SET_FFW_VELOCITY_MISSING;    retValue = false; }
01732         if (!setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = SET_FFW_CURRENT_MISSING;     retValue = false; }
01733         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])       { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01734         break;
01735 
01736       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_2:
01737       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_2_STANDBY:
01738         if (setTargetPositionDone[i])     { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; }
01739         if (setTargetVelocityDone[i])     { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; }
01740         if (setMeasureDone[i])        { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; } 
01741         if (!setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = SET_FFW_VELOCITY_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01742         if (!setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = SET_FFW_CURRENT_MISSING;  retValue = false; }
01743         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])       { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;    retValue = false; }
01744         break;
01745 
01746       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_4:
01747       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_4_STANDBY:
01748         if (!setTargetPositionDone[i])     { lastError = SET_TARGET_POSITION_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01749         if (!setTargetVelocityDone[i])     { lastError = SET_TARGET_VELOCITY_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01750         if (setMeasureDone[i])         { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; } 
01751         if (setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01752         if (setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01753         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01754         break;
01755 
01756       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_5:
01757       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_5_STANDBY:
01758         if (!setTargetPositionDone[i])     { lastError = SET_TARGET_POSITION_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01759         if (!setTargetVelocityDone[i])     { lastError = SET_TARGET_VELOCITY_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01760         if (setMeasureDone[i])         { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; } 
01761         if (setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01762         if (setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01763         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01764         break;
01765 
01766       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_7:
01767       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_7_STANDBY:
01768         if (!setTargetPositionDone[i])     { lastError = SET_TARGET_POSITION_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01769         if (setTargetVelocityDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;       retValue = false; }
01770         if (setMeasureDone[i])         { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; } 
01771         if (setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;       retValue = false; }
01772         if (setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;       retValue = false; }
01773         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;     retValue = false; }
01774         break;
01775 
01776       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_8:
01777         if (setTargetPositionDone[i])     { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; }
01778         if (setTargetVelocityDone[i])     { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; }
01779         if (setMeasureDone[i])        { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; } 
01780         if (!setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = SET_FFW_VELOCITY_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01781         if (setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])   { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; }
01782         if (setDeltaCurrentDone[i])       { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false; }
01783         break;
01784 
01785       case C4G_OPEN_MODE_9:
01786         if (setTargetPositionDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false;    }
01787         if (setTargetVelocityDone[i])      { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false;    }
01788         if (setMeasureDone[i])         { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false;    } 
01789         if (setFeedForwardVelocityDone[i]) { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false;    }
01790         if (setFeedForwardCurrentDone[i])  { lastError = OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED;  retValue = false;    }
01791         if (!setDeltaCurrentDone[i])       { lastError = SET_DELTA_CURRENT_MISSING; retValue = false; }
01792         break;
01793 
01794       default:
01795         break;
01796     }
01797   }
01798 
01799   return retValue;
01800 }
Generated on Wed Apr 16 15:48:38 2008 for C4Gopen by  1.5.1
